mapper.select:
select d.doctorId doctorId,d.doctorName doctorName, p.one one,p.two two,p.three three,p.four four,p.five five,p.six six,p.seven seven, one_time_period AS oneTimePeriod, two_time_period AS twoTimePeriod, three_time_period AS threeTimePeriod, four_time_period AS fourTimePeriod, five_time_period AS fiveTimePeriod, six_time_period AS sixTimePeriod, seven_time_period AS sevenTimePeriod from doctor d LEFT JOIN paiban p on p.doctorId=d.doctorId where d.dstate!=3
doctorName like concat('%' ,concat(#{doctorName},'%'))
order by d.doctorId desc
mapper.update: update paiban set one=#{one}, two=#{two}, three=#{three}, four=#{four}, five=#{five}, six=#{six}, seven=#{seven}, one_time_period=#{oneTimePeriod}, two_time_period=#{twoTimePeriod}, three_time_period=#{threeTimePeriod}, four_time_period=#{fourTimePeriod}, five_time_period=#{fiveTimePeriod}, six_time_period=#{sixTimePeriod}, seven_time_period=#{sevenTimePeriod} where doctorId = #{doctorId}
mapper.insert: insert into paiban (one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, doctorId, one_time_period, two_time_period, three_time_period, four_time_period, five_time_period, six_time_period, seven_time_period) values (#{one}, #{two}, #{three}, #{four}, #{five}, #{six}, #{seven}, #{doctorId}, #{oneTimePeriod}, #{twoTimePeriod}, #{threeTimePeriod}, #{fourTimePeriod}, #{fiveTimePeriod}, #{sixTimePeriod}, #{sevenTimePeriod})
